018package org.kordamp.maven.enforcer.checker;
019
020import org.apache.maven.enforcer.rule.api.EnforcerRule;
021import org.apache.maven.enforcer.rule.api.EnforcerRuleException;
022import org.apache.maven.enforcer.rule.api.EnforcerRuleHelper;
023import org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject;
024import org.codehaus.plexus.component.configurator.expression.ExpressionEvaluationException;
025import org.kordamp.maven.checker.BomChecker;
026import org.kordamp.maven.checker.MavenLoggerAdapter;
027import org.kordamp.maven.checker.PomCheckException;
028
029import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
030import javax.annotation.Nullable;
031
032/**
033 * Checks if a POM file is a minimal BOM file.
034 * Minimal BOM files contain the following elements:
035 * <ul>
036 * <li>&lt;groupId&gt;</li>
037 * <li>&lt;artifactId&gt;</li>
038 * <li>&lt;version&gt;</li>
039 * <li>&lt;dependencyManagement&gt;</li>
040 * </ul>
041 *
042 * @author Andres Almiray
043 * @since 1.0.0
044 */
045public class CheckBom implements EnforcerRule {
046    private boolean failOnError;
047
048    public boolean isFailOnError() {
049        return failOnError;
050    }
051
052    public CheckBom setFailOnError(boolean failOnError) {
053        this.failOnError = failOnError;
054        return this;
055    }
056
057    @Override
058    public void execute(@Nonnull EnforcerRuleHelper helper) throws EnforcerRuleException {
059        try {
060            MavenProject project = (MavenProject) helper.evaluate("${project}");
061            BomChecker.check(new MavenLoggerAdapter(helper.getLog()), project, new BomChecker.Configuration()
062                .withFailOnError(failOnError));
063        } catch (ExpressionEvaluationException e) {
064            throw new EnforcerRuleException("Unable to lookup an expression " + e.getLocalizedMessage(), e);
065        } catch (PomCheckException e) {
066            throw new EnforcerRuleException(e.getMessage());
067        }
068    }
069
070    @Override
071    public boolean isCacheable() {
072        return false;
073    }
074
075    @Override
076    public boolean isResultValid(@Nonnull EnforcerRule enforcerRule) {
077        return false;
078    }
079
080    @Nullable
081    @Override
082    public String getCacheId() {
083        return "";
084    }
085}
